channel.title: Click chest, get item, get teled
channel.description:
2. "How do I make it to where if I click on a chest, it gives me an item and also teleports me to a certain area? (U dont need a key to open the chest)"
---And if u give me the code, where to put it?---

item.title: Click chest, get item, get teled
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

case OBJECTID#: addItem(itemId#, itemAmount); teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("blah blah blah"); break;

Add that, but change it around to how you need it. Some of the Methods may be off. I haven’t worked with a wL Source for a while now, sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: Click chest, get item, get teled
